body_html:
Thanks! I didn't expect it could be implemented in so few lines of code. I'm not a TensorFlow expert (yet), just sniffing around basically :)
The tf.device class isn't available in Go either, and regarding this functionality, i didn't even see any C library functions to handle devices?

The tf.device class isn't available in Go either, and regarding this functionality, i didn't even see any C library functions to handle devices?
